name: Jump Pill - Demo
description:
Jump Pill - Demo

A puzzle platformer where your jump is only available by collecting jump pills. Yellow items spread out across the level. You will need to pick them up to navigate the level and head towards then end.

Controls:

Left and Right Arrow Keys: For movement
Z: Jump, Double Jump.
X: Dash.
R: Reset Level.

This is a demo to showcase a prototype so it's missing a couple of features like sound effects and background music. The art for the background would also change later on. For now, I hope you enjoy the gameplay.
